thread.title: BRIEF-American Renal Associates Settles Shareholder Class Action Litigation

title: BRIEF-American Renal Associates Settles Shareholder Class Action Litigation

organizations.name: renal associates settles shareholder class action litigation february

text:
February 1, 2018 / 1:36 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-American Renal Associates Settles Shareholder Class Action Litigation Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - American Renal Associates Holdings Inc : 
* AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES SETTLEMENT OF SHAREHOLDER CLASS ACTION LITIGATION 
* AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES HOLDINGS INC - PROPOSED SETTLEMENT PROVIDES FOR A TOTAL SETTLEMENT PAYMENT OF $4.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
